trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Escanaba
There were no other sightings in Escanaba on or around February 10th 2001
divs: Sighting DetailsI was at home on Friday, Feb. 9th(the first night) and noticed a brightlight in the sky. After watching for 20 minutes I looked through binoculars andsay a large round shape, with whitel lights in the center and red and greenaround it. It stayed there for over 1 hour, then slowly decended and truned redbefore going below the trees. This obhect has returned for 3 night now, and manypeople are watching it. I did take a very good video of this object and amwondering what it is.
Summary: Bright Light Seen in Escanaba Sky for 3 nights in
